type.description: Defines the order in which environments are shown

property.name: order
property.label: Environment Order
property.description: The order in which environments are shown. The regular expressions defined here, are replaced with an incremental number, in the order which is defined here. After the replacements the environments are sorte d lexicographically.

property.name: app
property.label: Default Application
property.description: The default application to show in the versions overview
